title: Cassiopeia's Rework is an April Fools Joke
body:
Calling it now. Some aspects of the new kit might be staying, but nominally most of what we've seen is an april fool's day prank.

SCREEN. CAP. THIS.

replies.body:
i really wished it was 

but NOPE

imo new cass kind of sucks

i liked the previous cass

this current cass passive sucks assss
they should just give the previous cass passive back to us
